description: Unified MFA Success Page lockdown - protects success page UI for all device types and flows

files.description: Main unified success page component - handles all device types (SMS, EMAIL, TOTP, FIDO2, VOICE, WHATSAPP) and both registration/authentication flows
Shared success page service - converts MFA flow data to unified format and provides MFASuccessPageV8 wrapper component
Authentication success page wrapper - converts authentication flow state to unified format for UnifiedMFASuccessPageV8
